Description.Name: SRM4 + Artemis IV
Description.Details: The midtier rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM4s deal good damage for comparatively few negatives other than their inherently short range and need for ammunition. As for all SRMs, SRM4 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. This SRM rack is equipped with an Artemis IV Fire Control System, dramatically increasing its accuracy at the cost of increased space and weight requirements. Artemis-compatible ammunition is required. Artemis IV-equipped weapons can not be used in conjunction with standard launchers. If one or more Artemis-enhanced launchers are present, all other SRMs/LRMs must have an Artemis IV FCS as well.
